metadata.title: GaryWear Active Brief, X-Large, Blush
features: Secures Absorbent Products: Use with pull-on or tab-style disposable diapers or large liners and pads. Also helps prevent Alzheimer's patients and others from removing diapers on their own.
Body Fitting Design: Slender new design is more fitted, quiet and discreet. Higher back keeps you extra dry at night. Contoured thigh cut helps prevent leaks out the leg openings.
Prevents Leaks on Clothes or Linens: Heavy-duty elastics around legs and waist to prevent leaks.

Sizing: Measure thigh, waist and hips to find best fitting size. Note The thigh dimension is the most important for preventing leaks. If using over cloth diapers we recommend ordering one size larger.

Sizing: Measure thigh, waist and hips to find best fitting size. Note The thigh dimension is the most important for preventing leaks. If using over cloth diapers we recommend ordering one size larger.
description: The GaryWear Active Brief is a fabric pant worn over an absorbent product and designed for an extra layer of protection. It is for active people of all ages with medium to heavy incontinence. Unlike traditional protective garments, Active Briefs feature a slimmer cut that makes them less bulky and more discreet. They are made from PUL (polyurethane laminated polyester) a breathable, waterproof fabric. Covered-in sturdy elastic and a contoured thigh cut helps prevent leaks. Higher back keeps you extra dry at night. Measure thigh, waist and hips to find best fitting size. Note: The thigh dimension is the most important for preventing leaks. These items are NOT RETURNABLE once opened due to sanitary reasons. Made in the USA. This item is non-returnable once opened due to sanitary reasons.
